recipes.name: Breakfast Burrito
recipes.desc: A heart healthy breakfast that's easy to make
recipes.ing: Bacon, Sausage, Eggs, Cheddar Cheese, Chopped Onion, Chopped Green Pepper, Chopped Red Pepper, Butter, Salt and Pepper
recipes.toolsNeeded: Frying Pan, Spatula, Tongs, Plate, Cutting Board, Medium Knife
recipes.instructs: First, cook meat and eggs. Then saute the chopped veggies in a frying pan with the butter. Once both are done, combine with the heat off. Add Cheddar Cheese. Add contents to a tortilla with your choice of condiments. Enjoy!

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.ing: Pancake mix, butter, maple syrup, fruit(optional), whipped cream, (you can also make bacon and eggs with this meal).
recipes.toolsNeeded: Frying pan or griddle, spatula, plates, butter knife, mixing bowl, large spoon, whisk, and measuring cups of 1 cup and 1/4th cup.
recipes.instructs: Make as directed on the package you chose.

recipes.name: Zoo Cakes
recipes.desc: A cake with chocolate animals on it for a party at the zoo.
recipes.time: 1 hour prepare time 40 minutes cooking time.
